english.segment1: Am I leavin life behind. Was I livin life at all. I still need to run and hide. Or have i really found the answer
english.segment2: Chorus: Over and over again, I am spiraling into nothing. Over and over again, I am spiraling into nothing
english.segment3: What I mean is I don't know. Exactly what it is I mean. The thing I don't wanna do I do. What I wanna do I don't
